name: WakiZoids
description:
This is part of Game Off 2017

https://itch.io/jam/game-off-2017

The theme is 'throwback'

Yeah, this is an asteroids game. Except... it's a throwback to a game I played over (mumble) years ago. The original version worked on the BBC series of machines (BBC Master 128, maybe?) and was very colourful, full of particles and had blackholes!

I'm using godot (v2.1.4) as the engine

https://godotengine.org/

Controls:

  • left arrow or A, spin left
  • right arrow or D, spin right
  • up arrow or W, thrust
  • CTRL, TAB or RETURN to fire
  • space, jump!
